pageDescription: Learn about our admission requirements, process, and important dates

mainContent.title: Join Our Engineering College
mainContent.description: Our admission process is designed to select motivated and talented students who have the potential to excel in engineering and technology fields. We welcome applications from students with strong academic backgrounds and a passion for innovation.

eligibilityRequirements.title: Academic Qualification
eligibilityRequirements.description: 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics as compulsory subjects with minimum 60% aggregate marks (55% for reserved categories).

eligibilityRequirements.title: Entrance Examination
eligibilityRequirements.description: Valid score in JEE Main/State Engineering Entrance Examination or the college's own entrance test.

eligibilityRequirements.title: Age Criteria
eligibilityRequirements.description: Candidates should not be more than 21 years of age as of July 1st of the admission year (relaxation for reserved categories as per norms).

admissionProcess.title: Online/Offline Registration
admissionProcess.description: Register for admission by filling out the application form online or visiting the campus in person.

admissionProcess.title: Interview Process
admissionProcess.description: Attend a personal interview to assess your interest, aptitude, and eligibility for the course.

admissionProcess.title: Document Verification
admissionProcess.description: Submit required documents in person or upload them online for verification.

admissionProcess.title: Counseling & Seat Allotment
admissionProcess.description: Take part in the counseling session and receive seat allotment based on performance and preferences.

admissionProcess.title: Fee Payment
admissionProcess.description: Pay the admission fees within the given time frame to confirm your allotted seat.

admissionProcess.title: Final Enrollment
admissionProcess.description: Complete the enrollment process by submitting original documents and joining the orientation program.

scholarships.name: Government Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Applicable for students belonging to OBC, SC, and ST categories as per government norms.
scholarships.benefit: Full or partial tuition fee waiver based on eligibility and government rules.

scholarships.name: Gaon Ki Beti Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Female students from rural areas who have passed 12th standard from a recognized board.
scholarships.benefit: Fixed annual financial aid as per state government scheme.

scholarships.name: SNS - SVS Merit Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Students who have successfully cleared the entrance exam conducted by SNS/SVS.
scholarships.benefit: Special tuition fee waiver or concession based on performance.
